full_address: 159-161 Merluna Road, Park Ridge South, Qld 4125
description:
Coastal meets French Provincial style in this stunning home set on an elevated 4355m2 block in a tranquil pocket of Park Ridge South. The home features a light and airy aesthetic, with a dominant crisp, white colour palette which promotes a sense of calm and serenity. It combines the perfect fusion of indoor and outdoor contemporary living and sits proudly amongst other quality builds in a family friendly neighbourhood with a tranquil bushland backdrop.

The gourmet kitchen lies at the heart of the home and is a chef's dream, with top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, including a 900mm gas cooktop and integrated electric oven, expansive stone benchtops, and an island with provision for casual dining. There is an abundance of cupboard and pantry storage as well as premium finishes and designer tapware which add a sense of luxury to the space. Adjoining the kitchen is the open plan living and dining area, which has a lovely outlook to the serene outdoor space and features expansive bay windows to allow the natural light to filter through effortlessly.

This charming home is an entertainer's paradise. The outside alfresco space is a perfect haven for unwinding and entertaining your loved ones. It strategically overlooks the inviting and sparkling resort-style inground pool, surrounded by lush gardens and sleek sandstone pavers to one side and an expansive grassed area to the other side, perfect for playing some backyard cricket or footy or simply letting the pets and kids roam free.

Back inside, the property boasts 4 impressive bedrooms plus a beautiful study room which can be utilised as an additional bedroom showcasing a stunning French double door entry. The master retreat is an oasis with a functional layout which features a large walk-in robe and a lovely reading/dresser enclave, perfect for unwinding or reading your favourite book. It also features a contemporary ensuite in a soothing colour palette that showcases a beautiful pedestal vanity, a striking stand-alone bathtub and a large shower. The main bathroom services the remaining bedrooms and is equally as impressive in design and function.

This property is the perfect place to escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Strategically located in one of Queensland's biggest growth corridors and located half-way between Brisbane and the Gold Coast and within close proximity to schools, shops, restaurants, medical facilities and access to major arterials, you will surely bask in everything this property has to offer. It is prime and ready for your inspection now.

PROPERTY FEATURES AND INCLUSIONS:
- Fully renovated lowset brick and tile home
- Perched on an elevated 4355m2 block
- Home is approx. 22 years old
- 4 spacious bedrooms plus study
- Master boasts large WIR and ensuite
- Contemporary family bathroom
- 2 separate living areas, with bay windows and views
- French provincial inspired gourmet kitchen featuring:
- Expansive stone benchtops including island bench
- 900mm gas cooktop and integrated electric oven
- Dishwasher
- Premium cabinetry
- Double sink with premium tapware
- Double timber French doors
- Ceiling fans
- Ducted air-conditioning
- Premium tiling throughout living areas
- Premium carpets to all bedrooms
- Plantation shutters
- Separate internal laundry with external access
- Generous internal storage
- Generous paved alfresco space
- Sparkling, saltwater resort-style inground pool
- Natural stone boulder retaining walls
- Large 2 bay carport with extra depth
- 7m x 9m shed with three phase power
- Perfectly manicured lawns and gardens
- Six-foot chain-link fence with iron gate to front
- Fully fenced
- Side access
- Approx 32000 L water tank
- Council rates approx $800/qtr inc water
